aboutMe.description: I've never been good at describing myself, but here I am, trying to let you know me a little.
aboutMe.description2: Since I was little I have transmitted my feelings and thoughts through painting. As I grew older, I thought it would be interesting to study what ancient artists like Leonardo Da Vinci felt. And that's how I ended up studying Art History. A career that I enjoyed like a dwarf and I was very happy studying it.
aboutMe.description3: I decided to take a radical turn in my life towards the world of web programming. This change has been a challenging adventure, like climbing the highest peak. I have encountered rocks along the way, but I am very proud of achieving it and having reached the top. But I still have many peaks to reach. My passion for art merges with the creativity and logic of web development. I am proactive, detail-oriented, patient, I like to work as a team and I am committed to improving myself day by day.
